prompt:
Summarize the following resume in 100 words or less:
ARUN PRASAD N R
Technical Project Management & Project Delivery
+91-8220828514 arunlife1711@gmail.com Bengaluru https://www.linkedin.com/in/arunprasadnr/
PROFILE
With over 16 years in the software industry, specializing in mobile and web applications, I bring 8+ years of experience as a Technical
Project Manager, proficient in Agile and Scrum methodologies. I have a proven track record of designing and delivering successful
products used by Fortune 300 companies and millions of end au sers. My expertise is in transforming ideas into market-ready
products by building agile, cross-functional teams, cultivating a culture of design-driven development, and ensuring a strong focus
on user experience and attention to detail.
E XPE RIENCE PRIMARY SKILLS
• Technical Project Management
U ST (Client – Dell Technologies) |March 2022 – Dec 2024
• Agile Methodology
PROJECT MANAGER II
• Scrum / Kanban
• Managed 4 project teams in an Agile (Scrum) environment, successfully applying SDLC
• Mobile & Web Applications
methodologies and leveraging strong leadership skills.
• Tools – JIRA, Confluence,
• Led cross-functional teams from end-to-end, driving collaboration, resolving conflicts, and
Smartsheet, GitHub, Bitbucket, Wiki,
ensuring successful delivery of each release.
GitBook, Telemetry, Firebase
• Developed project plans and controlled project scope using Agile practices, guiding projects
Crashlytics, MS Excel, Google
from conceptualization through implementation, deployment, and maintenance.
Analytics / Crashlytics
• Collaborated with business users, technical teams, DBAs, and testing teams in kickoff
meetings, joint application design, and planning sessions to validate requirements.
TECH SKILLS
• Led AI-related proof-of-concept (POC) projects from initiation to completion, employing
• Native Android & iOS - Java, Kotlin,
Agile/Scrum methodologies for internal use cases.
Swift, Objective-C
• Served as Scrum Master, facilitating sprint planning, daily stand-ups, sprint reviews,
